pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data used by the wrspathrow package // Contains the Worldwide Reference System (WRS) 1 and 2 polygon data from NASA, for use by the wrspathrow package. WRS-1 and WRS-2 Shape files courtesy of the U.S. Geological Survey, from http://landsat.usgs.gov /tools_wrs-2_shapefile.php
